title: 3 and Out - AFC/NFC Championship Reax: Stafford Validation, Clutch Burrow, Mahomes OT Faceplant, Jimmy G Roller Coaster
itunes:title: 3 and Out - AFC/NFC Championship Reax: Stafford Validation, Clutch Burrow, Mahomes OT Faceplant, Jimmy G Roller Coaster
description:
John reacts to the AFC and NFC Championship Games, including why the Rams W validated their Matt Stafford acquisition and general disregard for 1st round draft picks, the rapid rise of Joe Burrow, why he was so stunned at Patrick Mahomes' late game collapse, and why the Niners have already moved on from Jimmy G.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
